items.sentence: I don\'t know if I should turn left or right.
I don\'t know if Tom is in the office or not.
I don\'t know what Tom is doing in Australia.
I don\'t think that Tom knows how to do that.
Are you sure you don\'t want to swim with us?
Are you sure you don\'t want to wait for Tom?
Are you sure you really don\'t need anything?
Tom has everything a boy could possibly want.
Tom has just told me that he found a new job.
Tom has known Mary since he was a little boy.
Tom has lived alone ever since his wife died.
Tom has lost his interest in studying French.
Tom won\'t be able to answer those questions.
You\'re either with me or you\'re against me.
I\'ve learned a lot about astronomy from Tom.
I\'ve read thirteen books so far this summer.
No matter what I do, I can\'t make Tom laugh.
You\'ve got to go even if you don\'t want to.
I think you hate Tom as much as he hates you.
I think you might need to learn how to drive.
I don\'t believe that was ever a possibility.
I don\'t care what the color of your skin is.
I don\'t consider myself to be a good golfer.
I don\'t feel up to playing tennis right now.
How much did you have to pay for the tickets?
I am surprised to see you here in this hotel.
I thought Tom and Mary were both over thirty.
I thought Tom had already bought the tickets.
I thought Tom was going to give Mary flowers.
I thought Tom was supposed to be here by now.
I thought Tom would ask Mary a few questions.
I thought Tom would go to Boston to see Mary.
I wish I had learned French when I was a kid.
Do you have any idea why Tom did what he did?
Do you have any plans to come back to Boston?
Tom pretended he couldn\'t understand French.
Tom pretended that he couldn\'t speak French.
Tom wished he could understand French better.
Tom wishes for his son to inherit his estate.
Tom would lend you money if you asked him to.
Tom would like to be reincarnated as a woman.
What\'s your main reason for studying French?
Why did Tom think doing that was a good idea?
We know it was you that took Tom\'s umbrella.
Tom Jackson is the man you met the other day.
Tom always flies economy class to save money.
Tom and Mary are expecting their first child.
I bought these flowers for Mary, not for you.
I bought this book at a store on Park Street.
I bought this shirt at that store over there.
We need to be more aware of what\'s going on.
We\'ll just have to wait to see what happens.
Tom goes to the supermarket almost every day.
Tom got in trouble for not telling the truth.
Tom got married when he was thirty years old.
Eventually, Tom will likely agree to help us.
Everyone knows that two plus two equals four.
Give me one good reason why I should do that.
It\'s too late to do anything about that now.
It\'s up to you how you spend your free time.
I know it\'s inevitable that that\'ll happen.
I really should be getting ready for my trip.
I really think Tom is improving a great deal.
I received a strange phone call this morning.
I regret not having studied harder at school.
I can\'t find anything wrong with his theory.
I couldn\'t understand anything that he said.
Tom can\'t make himself understood in French.
Tom couldn\'t decide where to plant the tree.
Tom says he likes Boston better than Chicago.
The fire broke out after the staff went home.
Tom was at the wrong place at the wrong time.
Tom was surprised when he saw Mary in Boston.
Tom might\'ve died if you hadn\'t been there.
Tom was so tired he didn\'t even want to eat.
You don\'t need Tom\'s money or his approval.
I was hoping Tom wouldn\'t ask me to do that.
I was notified immediately of Tom\'s arrival.
Tom blames himself for what happened to Mary.
Tom bought some rope to use as a clothesline.
Tom brushed his teeth and put on his pajamas.
Tom called Mary every bad name under the sun.
We\'re doing things we\'ve never done before.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t know Mary.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t like Mary.
Tom wanted me to help Mary with her homework.
Tom wanted save up enough money to buy a car.
Tom wanted to buy a new pair of tennis shoes.
Tom wanted to get married after he graduated.

Do you have a flashlight that I could borrow?
Do you have any idea who could be doing this?
I just don\'t want there to be any bloodshed.
I just thought that you wouldn\'t want to go.
I just want Tom to know that we\'ll miss him.
You shouldn\'t judge others on how they look.
